thread.title: The Deserted Village of Slievemore on Achill Island, Ireland

author: Gary
title: The Deserted Village of Slievemore on Achill Island, Ireland
text:
The Deserted Village of Slievemore on Achill Island, Ireland 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/5.6 Exposure Time 1/1000 
The village of Slievemore sits at the base of Mount Slievemore, the highest point on Achill Island. While people lived here into the 20th century, it was largely abandoned because of the Irish Famine in the mid 19th century. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
